pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flood Probability Plotting and Graphical Frequency Analysis // Plotting flood quantiles and their corresponding probabilities (return periods) on the probability papers. The details of relevant methods are available in Chow et al (1988, ISBN: 007070242X, 9780070702424), and Bobee and Ashkar (1991, ISBN: 0918334683, 9780918334688).
